info.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of Disitamab Vedotin Combined With PD-1 in Posterior Line Therapy of Advanced HER2-low Expressing Gastric Cancer

inclusion_lines.line: 1. Must voluntarily join this study and sign an informed consent form;

criterions.exact_snippets: Must voluntarily join this study
sign an informed consent form

inclusion_lines.line: 2. Age 18-70 years old (including 18 years old and 70 years old);

criterions.exact_snippets: Age 18-70 years old (including 18 years old and 70 years old)
Expected survival period ≥ 12 weeks

inclusion_lines.line: 4. ECOG physical fitness score 0 or 1 point;

criterions.exact_snippets: ECOG physical fitness score 0 or 1 point

inclusion_lines.line: 5. Patients with incurable and unresectable locally advanced or metastatic gastric cancer (including gastroesophageal junction adenocarcinoma) confirmed by histology or cytology;

criterions.exact_snippets: incurable and unresectable locally advanced or metastatic gastric cancer
gastroesophageal junction adenocarcinoma
confirmed by histology or cytology

inclusion_lines.line: 6. The HER2 immunohistochemistry (IHC) test results are IHC 1+, the subject's previous test results (confirmed by the investigator) or the test results of the research center are acceptable;

criterions.exact_snippets: HER2 immunohistochemistry (IHC) test results are IHC 1+
subject's previous test results (confirmed by the investigator) ... are acceptable
test results of the research center are acceptable

inclusion_lines.line: 7. The patient has received second-line treatment (at least) after tumor recurrence/metastasis

criterions.exact_snippets: The patient has received second-line treatment (at least)

inclusion_lines.line: 8. Evidence of tumor disease progression during or after the most recent treatment, as documented by medical history or confirmed by the investigator;

criterions.exact_snippets: Evidence of tumor disease progression
documented by medical history
confirmed by the investigator

inclusion_lines.line: 9. At least one measurable lesion according to RECIST 1.1;

criterions.exact_snippets: At least one measurable lesion according to RECIST 1.1

inclusion_lines.line: 10. For female subjects: should be surgically sterilized, postmenopausal patients, or agree to use at least one medically approved contraceptive measure (such as an intrauterine device, contraceptives) during the study treatment period and within 6 months after the end of the study treatment period. pills or condoms), must have a negative blood pregnancy test within 7 days prior to study enrollment, and must be non-lactating; for male subjects: should for surgical sterilization, or agree to use a medically approved contraceptive method during the study treatment period and within 6 months after the end of the study treatment period of the experimental group subjects;

criterions.exact_snippets: female subjects: should be surgically sterilized
female subjects: ... postmenopausal patients
female subjects: ... agree to use at least one medically approved contraceptive measure
female subjects: ... must have a negative blood pregnancy test within 7 days prior to study enrollment
female subjects: ... must be non-lactating
male subjects: should for surgical sterilization
male subjects: ... agree to use a medically approved contraceptive method
Sufficient organ function

inclusion_lines.line: 1. Bone marrow function: hemoglobin ≥ 9g/dL; absolute neutrophil count ≥ 1.5×109/L; platelet ≥ 100×109/L;

criterions.exact_snippets: Bone marrow function: hemoglobin ≥ 9g/dL
Bone marrow function: ... absolute neutrophil count ≥ 1.5×109/L
Bone marrow function: ... platelet ≥ 100×109/L

inclusion_lines.line: 2. Liver function: serum total bilirubin ≤ 1.5 times the upper limit of normal (ULN); when there is no liver metastasis, alanine aminotransferase (ALT), aspartate aminotransferase (AST and alkaline phosphatase (ALP) ≤ 2.5×ULN, and in the presence of liver metastases ALT, AST, and ALP are ≤ 5×ULN;

criterions.exact_snippets: serum total bilirubin ≤ 1.5 times the upper limit of normal (ULN)
when there is no liver metastasis, alanine aminotransferase (ALT), aspartate aminotransferase (AST and alkaline phosphatase (ALP) ≤ 2.5×ULN
criterions.criterion: alanine aminotransferase (ALT), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alkaline phosphatase (ALP)

criterions.exact_snippets: in the presence of liver metastases ALT, AST, and ALP are ≤ 5×ULN
criterions.criterion: alanine aminotransferase (ALT), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alkaline phosphatase (ALP)

inclusion_lines.line: 3. Renal function (subject to the normal value of the clinical trial center): blood creatinine ≤ 1.5×ULN, or creatinine clearance rate (CrCl) ≥ 60 mL/min calculated by Cockcroft-Gault formula method, or 24-hour urine CrCl ≥ 60 mL/min;

criterions.exact_snippets: Renal function (subject to the normal value of the clinical trial center)

requirements.expected_value: subject to the normal value of the clinical trial center

criterions.exact_snippets: blood creatinine ≤ 1.5×ULN
creatinine clearance rate (CrCl) ≥ 60 mL/min calculated by Cockcroft-Gault formula method
24-hour urine CrCl ≥ 60 mL/min

inclusion_lines.line: 4. Heart function: New York Heart Association (NYHA) classification < Grade 3; left ventricular ejection fraction ≥ 50%;

criterions.exact_snippets: Heart function: New York Heart Association (NYHA) classification < Grade 3
left ventricular ejection fraction ≥ 50%

inclusion_lines.line: 12. Able to understand trial requirements, willing and able to comply with trial and follow-up procedures.

criterions.exact_snippets: Able to understand trial requirements
willing and able to comply with trial and follow-up procedures
criterions.criterion: compliance with trial and follow-up procedures

criterions.exact_snippets: Healthy volunteers allowed

inclusion_lines.line: Must have minimum age of 18 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: minimum age of 18 Years

inclusion_lines.line: Must have maximum age of 70 Years

criterions.exact_snippets: maximum age of 70 Years

exclusion_lines.line: 1. Brain metastasis or leptomeningeal metastasis;

criterions.exact_snippets: Brain metastasis
leptomeningeal metastasis

exclusion_lines.line: 2. Tumor lesions with a bleeding tendency (e.g., active ulcerated tumor lesions with a positive fecal occult blood test, history of vomiting blood or black stools within 2 months prior to signing the informed consent, risk of gastrointestinal hemorrhage in the judgment of the investigator) or previous blood transfusions in the 4 weeks prior to study drug administration;

criterions.exact_snippets: Tumor lesions with a bleeding tendency
active ulcerated tumor lesions with a positive fecal occult blood test
history of vomiting blood or black stools within 2 months prior to signing the informed consent

requirements.expected_value: within 2 months prior to signing the informed consent

criterions.exact_snippets: risk of gastrointestinal hemorrhage in the judgment of the investigator
previous blood transfusions in the 4 weeks prior to study drug administration

requirements.expected_value: in the 4 weeks prior to study drug administration

exclusion_lines.line: 3. Suffering from other malignant tumors within 5 years before signing the informed consent form (non-melanoma skin cancer, cervical carcinoma in situ, ductal carcinoma in situ or other tumors that have been effectively treated, except for malignant tumors that are considered cured);

criterions.exact_snippets: Suffering from other malignant tumors within 5 years before signing the informed consent form
non-melanoma skin cancer, cervical carcinoma in situ, ductal carcinoma in situ or other tumors that have been effectively treated

expected_value: other tumors that have been effectively treated

criterions.exact_snippets: malignant tumors that are considered cured

exclusion_lines.line: 4. Received chemotherapy, radiotherapy, and immune therapy within 4 weeks before the start of the study drug

criterions.exact_snippets: Received chemotherapy ... within 4 weeks before the start of the study drug
Received ... radiotherapy ... within 4 weeks before the start of the study drug
Received ... immune therapy within 4 weeks before the start of the study drug

exclusion_lines.line: 5. Received palliative radiotherapy for bone metastases within 2 weeks before the start of the study drug;

criterions.exact_snippets: Received palliative radiotherapy for bone metastases

expected_value.unit: weeks before the start of the study drug

exclusion_lines.line: 6. Received anti-tumor traditional Chinese medicine treatment within 2 weeks before the start of the study drug;

criterions.exact_snippets: Received anti-tumor traditional Chinese medicine treatment within 2 weeks before the start of the study drug

exclusion_lines.line: 7. The toxicity caused by previous anti-tumor therapy has not recovered to CTCAE (version 4.03) grade 0-1 (except for alopecia, hyperpigmentation, and long-term toxicity caused by radiotherapy, which in the judgment of the investigator cannot be recovered);

criterions.exact_snippets: toxicity caused by previous anti-tumor therapy has not recovered to CTCAE (version 4.03) grade 0-1
alopecia
hyperpigmentation
long-term toxicity caused by radiotherapy, which in the judgment of the investigator cannot be recovered

exclusion_lines.line: 8. Prior treatment with T-DM1 or participation in a clinical study of this type of drug;

criterions.exact_snippets: Prior treatment with T-DM1
participation in a clinical study of this type of drug
criterions.criterion: participation in a clinical study of T-DM1

exclusion_lines.line: 9. The study drug has been used within 4 weeks before the start of the study drug;

criterions.exact_snippets: The study drug has been used within 4 weeks before the start of the study drug

exclusion_lines.line: 10. Major surgery has been performed within 4 weeks before the start of the study drug and the patient has not fully recovered;

criterions.exact_snippets: Major surgery has been performed within 4 weeks before the start of the study drug
the patient has not fully recovered

exclusion_lines.line: 11. Have been vaccinated with live vaccines within 4 weeks before the start of the study drug or plan to receive any vaccines during the study period;

criterions.exact_snippets: vaccinated with live vaccines within 4 weeks before the start of the study drug
plan to receive any vaccines during the study period

exclusion_lines.line: 12. Arterial/venous thrombotic events, such as cerebrovascular accident (including temporary ischemic attack), deep vein thrombosis, pulmonary embolism, and myocardial infarction, occurred within 1 year before the study drug;

criterions.exact_snippets: Arterial/venous thrombotic events, such as cerebrovascular accident (including temporary ischemic attack), deep vein thrombosis, pulmonary embolism, and myocardial infarction, occurred within 1 year before the study drug

requirements.expected_value: within 1 year before the study drug

exclusion_lines.line: 13. Suffering from uncontrolled systemic diseases, including diabetes, hypertension, pulmonary fibrosis, acute lung disease, interstitial lung disease, liver cirrhosis, angina pectoris, serious arrhythmia, etc.;

criterions.exact_snippets: uncontrolled systemic diseases, including diabetes
uncontrolled systemic diseases, including ... hypertension
uncontrolled systemic diseases, including ... pulmonary fibrosis
uncontrolled systemic diseases, including ... acute lung disease
uncontrolled systemic diseases, including ... interstitial lung disease
uncontrolled systemic diseases, including ... liver cirrhosis
uncontrolled systemic diseases, including ... angina pectoris
uncontrolled systemic diseases, including ... serious arrhythmia

exclusion_lines.line: 14. Suffering from active infection requiring systemic treatment;

criterions.exact_snippets: Suffering from active infection requiring systemic treatment

exclusion_lines.line: 15. History of active tuberculosis;

criterions.exact_snippets: History of active tuberculosis

exclusion_lines.line: 16. Positive human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) test result;

criterions.exact_snippets: Positive human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) test result

exclusion_lines.line: 17. Patients with active hepatitis B or C (HBsAg positive and HBV DNA titers higher than the upper limit of normal when HBsAg is positive; HCVAb positive and HCV RNA titers higher than the upper limit of normal when HBsAg is positive);

criterions.exact_snippets: Patients with active hepatitis B ... HBsAg positive
HBsAg positive
HBV DNA titers higher than the upper limit of normal
HCVAb positive
HCV RNA titers higher than the upper limit of normal

exclusion_lines.line: 18. Presence of third interstitial fluid that cannot be controlled by drainage or other methods (including massive pleural effusion or ascites);

criterions.exact_snippets: Presence of third interstitial fluid
cannot be controlled by drainage or other methods
massive pleural effusion
ascites

exclusion_lines.line: 19. Known to have hypersensitivity or delayed allergic reactions to certain components of RC48-ADC or similar drugs;

criterions.exact_snippets: hypersensitivity or delayed allergic reactions to certain components of RC48-ADC or similar drugs

exclusion_lines.line: 20. Exclude, at the investigator's discretion, other conditions that might confuse the study results or affect the subjects' ability to follow the study procedures, such as alcoholism, drug abuse, mental disorders, criminal detention, etc.;

criterions.exact_snippets: alcoholism
drug abuse
mental disorders
criminal detention

exclusion_lines.line: 21. Suffering from any other disease, metabolic abnormality, abnormal physical examination, or abnormal laboratory test, according to the judgment of the investigator, there is reason to suspect that the subject has a certain disease or condition that is not suitable for the use of the study drug, or will affect the research results interpretations, or situations that place the subject at high risk;

criterions.exact_snippets: Suffering from any other disease
metabolic abnormality
abnormal physical examination
abnormal laboratory test

exclusion_lines.line: 22. Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or women/men who are planning to give birth;

criterions.exact_snippets: Women who are pregnant
breastfeeding
women/men who are planning to give birth

exclusion_lines.line: 23. It is estimated that the subjects' compliance to participate in this clinical study is insufficient or the investigators believe that there are other factors that are not suitable for participating in this study.

criterions.exact_snippets: subjects' compliance to participate in this clinical study is insufficient
investigators believe that there are other factors that are not suitable for participating in this study
